src.gpt_wrappers module

class src.gpt_wrappers.ChatGPTWithMemory(system_prompt, model='gpt-3.5-turbo')[source]

Bases: object

A wrapper for the OpenAI Chat API that allows for a memory to be maintained between calls to the API. This is useful for a chatbot that is maintaining a conversation with a user.

Class for XML quality checks, check if the xml file is valid, has a minimum depth and width Input is a file path to the XML file
